alert.note: Alert for Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 11:02AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Souris River near Foxholm affecting Ward County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Foxholm. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1571.0 feet, East bank begins to overflow. At 1575.0 feet, Rural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 1571.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 1573.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 1573.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1573.2 feet on 03/25/1996. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
